      • scanForAuthCodes

        protected static boolean scanForAuthCodes(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> auths,
                                          java.lang.String ipAddress)
        Main Server-Database security checking method
        Parameters:
        auths - Authentication codes from Client
        ipAddress - Connected client's ip address
        Returns:
        A boolean value true if there are all matches positive, false if failed

        addLogLineToDatabase method adds log line to database, registering an event
        Parameters:

        project_key - Client's unique project key
        type - Log file type
        Returns:
        Last inserted id to database of Log line

                                                      java.lang.String connectedIp)
        Parameters:
        project_key - Client's unique project key
        connectedIp - Client's ip
        Returns:
        A boolean value true if ip address is matched one from database, false if failed
